menu_odp_general_master_enabled_desc: Enable or disable popups from this mod.
menu_odp_general_fun_allowed_desc: Enables some silly April Fool's effects.
menu_odp_general_use_raw_damage_desc: If true, use reported raw damage values.
menu_odp_general_use_player_damage_only_: If true, ignore damage from sources other than yourself.
menu_odp_general_hide_zero_damage_hits_d: If true, ignore hits that deal no damage.
menu_odp_general_damage_decimal_accuracy: How many places of accuracy after the decimal to show
menu_odp_group_damage_aggregate_mode_des:
Choose how to group damage hits together.
None: No grouping. | Unit: Adds damage on the same unit. | Body: Adds damage on the same part of the same unit.
menu_odp_group_damage_time_window_desc: Successive hits within this many seconds are counted in the same group.
menu_odp_group_damage_use_refresh_desc: If true, the time window will refresh on hit, allowing for longer damage stacking.
menu_odp_appearance_use_damage_type_icon: If true, display an icon next to the damage number, representing the type of damage inflicted.
menu_odp_appearance_popup_style_desc: Choose how the damage popup is animated.
menu_odp_appearance_use_body_relative_po:
If true, popups will move alongside the hit unit.
If false, popups will only move relative to their initial positions.
menu_odp_appearance_popup_hold_duration_: How long the popup stays fully visible, before starting to disappear
menu_odp_appearance_popup_fade_duration_: How long it takes for the popup to fully disappear, after the initial duration
menu_odp_appearance_popup_fontsize_pulse: The size of the popup's growth animation on headshot.
The duration of the popup's growth animation on headshot
menu_odp_appearance_popup_font_custom_en: If true, specify another existing font (below) to use for damage number text.
menu_odp_quickkeyboardinput_custom_font_: Click to enter the path to your custom font. Requires QuickKeyboardInput.
menu_odp_appearance_popup_font_size_desc: Adjust how large the damage popup text will be
menu_odp_colorpicker_customize_bullet_de: Click to customize the color of Bullet damage. Requires ColorPicker.
menu_odp_colorpicker_customize_melee_des: Click to customize the color of Melee damage. Requires ColorPicker.
menu_odp_colorpicker_customize_poison_de: Click to customize the color of Poison damage. Requires ColorPicker.
menu_odp_colorpicker_customize_fire_desc: Click to customize the color of Fire damage. Requires ColorPicker.
menu_odp_colorpicker_customize_explosion: Click to customize the color of Explosion damage. Requires ColorPicker.
menu_odp_colorpicker_customize_tase_desc: Click to customize the color of Tase damage. Requires ColorPicker.
menu_odp_colorpicker_customize_misc_desc: Click to customize the color of miscellaneous damage types. Requires ColorPicker.
menu_odp_dialog_missing_colorpicker_desc: You need ColorPicker to use this feature! You can download it from here: $URL
menu_odp_dialog_missing_qki_desc: You need QuickKeyboardInput to use this feature! You can download it from here: $URL
menu_odp_dialog_custom_font_desc:
Type the path to the font resource here.
- The font must already be loaded to be used; this mod will not do it for you.
- Do not include quotation marks, file extensions, or the mods folder.
Example:
fonts/font_eurostile_ext
Press $BTN_CONFIRM to confirm, or $BTN_CANCEL to cancel.
